text: The National Library of Spain () is in Madrid. It is Spain's largest library.World Encyclopedia of Library and Information Services, ed. Robert Wedgeworth (Chicago : American Library Association, 1993), p. 783 It is also one of the world's largest libraries. It was started by King Philip V of Spain in 1712. == References == == Other websites == * Official site * Official web catalog Spain Category:Buildings and structures in Madrid Category:18th- century establishments in Spain Category:1710s establishments in Europe
title: National Library of Spain
